vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
ERC20BasicNS (ERC20BasicNS.sol#10-15) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (ERC20BasicNS.sol#13)

vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function balanceOf(address who) public view returns (uint256);

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in ERC20BasicNS.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.8 (ERC20BasicNS.sol#3): it allows old versions

errors: input files do not contain any valid contracts
